name: idbify
description: A simple interface for IDB with promises, you can define your schema up front and then it provides put, delete, and get functions.
author: Colt Pini <coltpini@github.com>

scripts.prepare: npm run build-module && npm run build-umd
scripts.build-umd: mkdir -p dist && babel --plugins babel-plugin-transform-es2015-modules-umd idbify.js -o dist/idbify.umd.js
